Class GroqApiClient

java.lang.Object
com.groq.api.client.GroqApiClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
AudioService, ChatCompletionService, GroqApi, ModelsService, ToolsService, VisionService, AutoCloseable
public class GroqApiClient extends Object implements GroqApi
Main client for interacting with the Groq API. Provides implementation for all Groq API services.

      Creates a new GroqApiClient with the specified configuration and HTTP client.
      Parameters:
      config - The configuration for the API client.
      httpClient - The HTTP client for making requests.
      objectMapper - The JSON object mapper.

    • createTranscription

      public CompletableFuture<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> createTranscription(InputStream audioFile, String fileName, String model, String prompt, String responseFormat, String language, Float temperature)
      Creates a transcription from an audio file.
      Specified by:
      createTranscription in interface AudioService
      Parameters:
      audioFile - The audio file input stream.
      fileName - The name of the audio file.
      model - The model to use for transcription.
      prompt - Optional prompt to guide the transcription.
      responseFormat - The format of the response (default: "json").
      language - Optional language of the audio.
      temperature - Optional temperature parameter for generation.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture that will complete with the response JSON object.
